name: memes-gifs
title: Memes/gifs
description: Effortlessly discover and share the funniest memes and trending GIFs directly from Tenor, right within Raycast! Instantly fetch a wide variety of Indian and global memes, search by keyword, and preview or copy GIFs to use in your work or chats. Perfect for anyone who loves bringing humor and viral content into their workflow with zero friction.
author: shubhra_agarwal

commands.name: meme
commands.title: Meme
commands.description: Effortlessly discover and share the funniest memes and trending GIFs directly from Tenor, right within Raycast! Perfect for anyone who loves bringing humor and viral content into their workflow with zero friction.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
